attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is to show support to the station that plans to cut firefighters hours at Birchwood Fire Station - ending full time night cover is a shame and if given the go-ahead, would start on January, 1 2011 and could mean full time firefighters working 12 hour day shifts and part time fire fighters on call overnight this could risk lives.we just need your help to show support for the firefighter at birchwood.
